name: Dreams Inception
description:
Objective:- To find and carry commander to the finish line.

Short Story:- So there has been tension around countries for which people are raging WW3. Among them one of the brutal leader has been kidnapped into a flight, so as to plant/redirect an idea of not having WW3.

Gameplay:- Player plays as an architect, and the dreamer is the host. The game starts when flight starts its journey and we have exactly 5 minutes to complete the game.

  • Player can enter into dream worlds 1,2,3 which they have their own advantages and disadvantages.
  • Dream world 1 advantage - Infinite Jumps
  • Dream world 2 advantage - Powerful gun (One Hit Kill)
  • Dream world 3 advantage - Inverse Gravity
  • Time being crucial if completely used in any dream then that dream becomes inaccessible with its powers also being inaccessible.
  • Powers unlocked in previous dreams can be used in deeper dreams.
  • Disadvantages increase as we go deeper into dreams, as enemies become more faster and shoot bullets faster.
  • Entering Dream world 1 slows down Real world time by 0.5
  • Entering Dream world 2 slows down Dream world 1 time by 0.5 and Real world time by 0.3
  • Entering Dream world 3 slows down Dream world 2 time by 0.5 and Dream world 1 time by 0.3 and Real world time by 0.15.
  • Successive entries and exits are only allowed.
  • Higher Sedative is to be collected to enter Dream world 3.
  • Exiting a Dream world stops its time usage.
  • Getting killed at any point of dream brings the player down to the start point of previous dream initiation, i.e dying in Dream world 3 brings player back to the point where he started Dream world 2.
  • Time doesn't resets when death has been embraced in any dream world.
  • Killing / Getting detected by enemies (Host subconscious elements), Changing gravity, Shooting, picking up weapons raises dream disturbance, which when crossed 50% threshold will create dream instability, leading to shaking of the world progressively with respect to dream disturbance.
  • Game completion only possible when Host is carried by player to finish line, whilst entered all 3 dream worlds.
